thread.title: HELP : Solo Budget Trip August End Meghalaya
thread.title_full: HELP : Solo Budget Trip August End Meghalaya

author: Nitin Govindan
title: HELP : Solo Budget Trip August End Meghalaya
text: # 1 Hi IM, I am planning(meh..hoping) a trip to Meghalaya this weekend. I will be arriving at Guawahati on 21st and need guidance ahead. Since I am travelling solo and IT sweatshops are not too generous, I am not sure If i will be able to book taxi for the whole trip or so. Please help me to plan the trip in best way possible. I need to be at Guawahati airport on 31st morning so I guess Guwahati by 30th anyhow. Lots of love,
